message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate, let's finish the game!
Let's give me a bit more, I'm the one who will have to deal with the inflation!
You're trying to take advantage of inflation, but I'm not going to let you have it all! Take 40%!
I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I still think I deserve a bit more. You're not getting it all, Alice!
You're not getting any more than 45% of the remaining value! Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up! Let's try to find a middle ground. I'll take 50% and we can call it a day.
